long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Valorant Pro Matches Extension is a tool designed for fans of the popular game Valorant.
Click on which tournaments you want to follow and see when they are live, where to watch and the results of the match.

Version 1.6.1 changes:
- Fixed setting the auto follow settings

Version 1.6 changes:
- Added option to auto follow events

Version 1.5 changes:
- Fixed settings not being set

Version 1.4 changes:
- Improved data loading
- Added customization for theme, size and font size

Version 1.3 changes:
- Able to scroll trough streams if there are too many
- Able to see when it is updating
- Improved data fetching

Version 1.2 changes:
- Show the streams of live matches
- Some styling improvements

Version 1.1 changes:
- Show all that upcoming matches

Disclaimer:
This extension is not affiliated with Valorant or its developers. This extension is not affiliated with vlr.gg or its developers. The data provided is sourced from vlr.gg, an independent platform dedicated to Valorant esports. We do not claim any official association with Riot Games or Valorant. All rights and trademarks belong to their respective owners.
